entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nagagami 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %

Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
